snippet.title: Mario Kart 64 - New Cast, Full Voiced!
snippet.description:
New characters with their own voices include Waluigi, Sonic the Hedgehog, Crash Bandicoot, Samus Aran (Metroid), Banjo (Banjo-Kazooie) and Link (Legend of Zelda). Shovel Knight replaces Yoshi.

This is running on a real N64, captured from RGB (I think I left a sharpener on accidentally which has made it look worse) via an Everdrive, but the ROM would also work on emulators.

A big thank you to Zouzzz from X-Community.grafbb.com who created and implemented the new characters, and for pointing me to N64 SoundTool so I could figure out how to add the new voices to the ROM. If you want to follow the discussion (You may need to use Google Translate as it is in French) then go here;
http://x-community.grafbb.com/t1740p25-n64-mario-kart-64-etudes-et-tp

If you like this, please Like and Subscribe and we will get a Lets Play done. I will also work on voicing the remaining characters and any new ones Zouzzz creates.

--------------
FORUM LINK
http://x-community.grafbb.com/t1740p75-n64-mario-kart-64-etudes-et-tp#27190

--------------
DOWNLOAD LINK
https://www.mediafire.com/file/ogxq68xq03q729v/Mario%20Kart%2064%20Deluxe%20BETA%200.8%20%28U%29%20%5B%21%5D.z64

--------------
CREDITS
Artwork Changes: Zouzzz
Audio Changes: Roareye Black
Shovel Knight Model: MrPr1993
Shovel Knight In-Game: Mark Kane
